name: Sketchbook Dress Up [fangame]
description:
It's Halloween, the perfect time to play dress-up, but wouldn't it be more fun if you could dress someone else up, who you don't even know personally? Well, do I have the perfect thing for you!

Introducing the Sketchbook Dress-up, where a bunch of syktwt artists have drawn out a bunch of costumes for your favorite streamer for fun to wear.

Feel free to screenshot your outfits and post them with #SyktwtDressUp :D So...

It's finally done! Well, not really as you can see.

The Sykkuno dress-up game is mostly done, but I'm also accepting future submissions for both Sykkuno AND other amigops members. (I couldn't help myself of course.)

This was partially made because I wanted to have a comprehensive page of all the syktwt artists around cause they're all super lovely, so please check out the artists that helped!

Also, if you're one of those lovely artists and you haven't had a chance to add a piece I highly encourage you to reach out! At least, if you're interested of course. You can send me a DM here!

Known bugs
  • Some clothes don't layer perfectly on top of each other, if anything looks wildly wrong feel free to let me know which combo is whack
